thread.section_title: Homestay.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homestay.com | homestay.com
thread.title: Lynette Van Der Walt
thread.title_full: Homestay.com reviewed by Lynette Van Der Walt

author: Lynette Van Der Walt
title: Lynette Van Der Walt
text:
Great family, friendly and hospitable. Fun to be with and love the company and socialising. Very clean and tidy rooms and toilet facilities. Hosts are very approachable, helpful and understanding. Will definitely recommend to friends, work colleagues and students. Will see me again in the near future.
Thank you, Verity and David. for the great service and experience. Glad to have met you.
